website_summaries.verdict: Liquid soft-gel boasting over 70 nutrients, vitamins, and minerals tailored for men.
pros: Liquid gel tabs are easier to swallow and faster to react
Features pumpkin seed oil, saw palmetto, and Omega-3s
cons: 3 pills to be taken per serving

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be aware of the warning label
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these as they looked like a very good option to help supplement some additional vitamins into my diet. It was also nice to see this product included fish oils. However, PLEASE BE AWARE there is a warning on the bottle regarding California Prop 65 “This product contains a chemical known to the state of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm”. To me even if it is a small chance of this product negatively impacting my reproductive health it’s not worth my time. Especially when you are taking a product for its health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Blake davis

customer_reviews.title: Good Difference When Taking
customer_reviews.text: For my oldest son. Terminally ill. He says he can tell the difference when he doesn't take them. I watch for deals. Subscribe & Save.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ridley

customer_reviews.title: I am always looking for a really good supplement and this is a great one
customer_reviews.text: My husband will actually take these! I am always looking for a really good supplement and this is a great one! I have done a lot of research and am glad I did. This brand is great and with all the "extras" it has in it I feel really good that y husband is getting the little things that other brands have left out. I only want to but things in our body that are going to make a difference and have good ingredient, after reading and going to the health food store for a print out on their 4 brands they carry, coming home and doing my own reseaech, this was the obvious winner.
customer_reviews.author: SAHM

customer_reviews.title: my husband doesn’t like to take vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Generally, my husband doesn’t like to take vitamins, but I bought these for him. Now, he places the empty bottle out for me to order more. He is on his 3rd bottle. I think that it is safe to say that he recommends them.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Kimble-Wright

customer_reviews.title: These are "iffy"
customer_reviews.text: Great product with a quality control issue. You can receive a bottle of these and they're perfect. The next one, the pills are greasy and smell of bad fish oil. Roll the dice and take the chance....otherwise, a superior product and 5 stars.

They have a fish oil smell to them and while I like the idea of them being healthy I am slightly apprehensive about swallowing them at their size as rather hard liquid gels, but that is better than solids still.

customer_reviews.title: Great source of nutrients
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product because it combined all the necessities i was looking for, vitamins, minerals, oils, antioxidants, etc... into one easy gel capsule. It would be difficult to rate the effectiveness because you really don't know how effectively it is working. That said, I have been taking Irwin Naturals for 3 months now and I feel great! My favorite part of this product is the twelve categories of nutrients, specifically the brain blend! In this day and age there is so many nutrients we are expected to take and Irwin does a great job of combining them. I recommend this product to anyone looking for a simple way of taking that great mass of recommended vitamins, oils, and minerals.
customer_reviews.author: Andremunay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrific vitamins! If your looking for an all around quality product you definitely need to try this one!

customer_reviews.title: Two more bottles and my voyage is complete!
customer_reviews.text: I figure that getting these vitamins is the first step in my voyage to becoming a recyclable Incredible Hulk. I ripped that plastic safety cap off with a bit of difficulty when I first got this, but now that I am on my second bottle, I could tell that it's beginning to work. That plastic safety wrap came off with the same ease as finding a beer during spring break. Look out Mr Abrams Tank, the Hulk is on his way!
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: Great multi!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I had stopped taking it about six months ago due to moving into my first home and getting adjusted. And could feel different just being off it - sluggish, less alert, etc. etc. Shipping was fast. After just a few days I can already feel it working and like my old self again. Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Good Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. While I don't buy into the whole liquid portion, the vitamins are coming from whole food sources. There's nothing natural about a multivitamin but it's a lot closer to the real thing then the synthetic vitamins. WARNING~ These vitamins are "subjected" to having small traces of lead in them. I still don't know how I feel about this. For now I'm taking them. I called and asked and they said they do the best to make sure their products are lead free as they can be.

customer_reviews.title: ... the research and found that whole food vitamins are better for us than synthetics
customer_reviews.text: I read all the research and found that whole food vitamins are better for us than synthetics. Since whole food vitamins are basically dried/concentrated foods, our bodies identify and absorb the ingredients more easily. I originally tried Alive multivitamins for months, but the tablets always made me feel nauseous for some reason. I've been taking these for over a year and I haven't felt nauseated once. Health wise....the Doc says I'm just fine so I guess they're working.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Love it comes in glass bottles. So far seems to be a quality product. Pills are a little large. I have no problem with them. Everyone needs a good multi vitamins because food today has no nutritional value. Mega dose vitamins really help. Consult Dr when talking anything first.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a really hard time swallowing pills. The pill must be gel or he will never get the pill down. I have bought this vitamin for him for years, with no issues.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. They seem to work in the sense that I feel energized. I have been on the cusp of getting sick during this fall season but seem to never get a full on cold. I am assuming that this is because I am taking these supplements along with other vitamins. I like the fact that they are liquid caps. I would imagine that the vitamins get into your system much faster that way. One cool side effect seems to be that if you take this vitamin at night, your dreams may become more vivid. When I take them at night I have full color, crazy, vivid dreams. This product is worth getting!!!
customer_reviews.author: UbbyDubby
